::Battera::

She looked at the ground.  she couldn't face the one who used to be 
her friend.  She felt ashamed and dishonored.  
"I .....I thought you were all killed." her voice trembling,"I know I 
should have stayed and fought with you. I know that I should have 
been the one to die and not you."
She stood there with her head down and wanting to not realy be 
standing there facing her old friend.
"I'm sorry I was a coward. I'm sorry that I failed you as a friend."
She felt like she was talking to a ghost in a dream.
She wanted to cry, but held it in.  She was scared, angry, ashamed 
and hurt all at once.
